\\/D:\\/repos\\/stride-translations\\/pt: The <g1>graphics platform<\/g1> controls the graphics hardware in the device you run your project on.
A plataforma <g1>graphics<\/g1> controla o hardware gráfico no dispositivo em que você roda seu projeto.
The <g1>graphics platform<\/g1> controls the graphics hardware in the device you run your project on.
Different devices support different graphics platforms; for example, iOS supports the OpenGL ES graphics platform.
Diferentes dispositivos suportam diferentes plataformas gráficas; por exemplo, o iOS suporta a plataforma gráfica OpenGL ES.
Different devices support different graphics platforms; for example, iOS supports the OpenGL ES graphics platform.
You can select which graphics platform your game uses, and add overrides for different platforms (eg Windows, Android, etc).
Você pode selecionar qual plataforma gráfica seu jogo usa e adicionar substituições para diferentes plataformas (por exemplo, Windows, Android, etc).
You can select which graphics platform your game uses, and add overrides for different platforms (eg Windows, Android, etc).
Moving from Direct3D to an earlier Direct3D version can create problems.
Mudar de Direct3D para uma versão anterior do Direct3D pode criar problemas.
Moving from Direct3D to an earlier Direct3D version can create problems.
For example, if your game contains HDR textures, it will crash, as Direct3D 9 doesn't support them.
Por exemplo, se o seu jogo contém texturas HDR, ele vai falhar, como Direct3D 9 não os suporta.
For example, if your game contains HDR textures, it will crash, as Direct3D 9 doesn't support them.
You set the graphics platform in the <g1>game settings<\/g1> asset.
Você define a plataforma gráfica no ativo <g1>game settings<\/g1>.
You set the graphics platform in the <g1>game settings<\/g1> asset.
Make sure you have the latest drivers for the graphics platforms you want to use.
Certifique-se de ter os drivers mais recentes para as plataformas gráficas que você deseja usar.
Make sure you have the latest drivers for the graphics platforms you want to use.
In the <g1>Asset View<\/g1>, select the <g2>Game Settings<\/g2> asset.
No <g1>Asset View<\/g1>, selecione o ativo <g2>Game Settings<\/g2>.
In the <g1>Asset View<\/g1>, select the <g2>Game Settings<\/g2> asset.
In the Property Grid, under <g1>Rendering Settings > Target graphics platform<\/g1>, select the graphics platform you want to use.
Na Grade de Propriedade, em <g1>Configurações de Correção > Plataforma gráfica de destino<\/g1>, selecione a plataforma gráfica que você deseja usar.
In the Property Grid, under <g1>Rendering Settings > Target graphics platform<\/g1>, select the graphics platform you want to use.
If you select <g1>Default<\/g1>, Stride uses the graphics platform appropriate for your platform (eg Windows, Android) when you build.
Se você selecionar <g1>Default<\/g1>, Stride usa a plataforma gráfica apropriada para sua plataforma (por exemplo, Windows, Android) quando você construir.
If you select <g1>Default<\/g1>, Stride uses the graphics platform appropriate for your platform (eg Windows, Android) when you build.
You can override the graphics platform Stride uses for specific platforms.
Você pode substituir a plataforma gráfica que a Stride usa para plataformas específicas.
You can override the graphics platform Stride uses for specific platforms.
For example, you can have Linux use Vulkan while other platforms use the default.
Por exemplo, você pode usar o Linux Vulkan enquanto outras plataformas usam o padrão.
For example, you can have Linux use Vulkan while other platforms use the default.
With the <g1>GameSettings<\/g1> asset selected, in the Property Grid, under <g2>Overrides<\/g2>, click <x1\/>Green plus button<x2\/> (<g3>Add<\/g3>).
Com o ativo <g1>GameSettings<\/g1> selecionado, na Grade de Propriedade, abaixo de <g2>Overrides<\/g2>, clique em <x1\/>Green plus button<x2\/> (<g3>Add<\/g3>).
With the <g1>GameSettings<\/g1> asset selected, in the Property Grid, under <g2>Overrides<\/g2>, click <x1\/>Green plus button<x2\/> (<g3>Add<\/g3>).
In the new override, next to <g1>Platforms<\/g1>, select the platforms you want this override to apply to.
Na nova substituição, ao lado de <g1>Platforms<\/g1>, selecione as plataformas às quais você deseja que essa substituição seja aplicada.
In the new override, next to <g1>Platforms<\/g1>, select the platforms you want this override to apply to.
In the <g1>Configuration<\/g1> drop-down menu, select <g2>Rendering Settings<\/g2>.
In the <g1>Configuration<\/g1> drop-down menu, select <g2>Rendering Settings<\/g2>.
Under <g1>Rendering Settings<\/g1>, in the <g2>Preferred Graphics Platform<\/g2> drop-down menu, select the graphics platform you want to use.
Em <g1>Rendering Settings<\/g1>, no menu suspenso <g2>Preferred Graphics Platform<\/g2>, selecione a plataforma gráfica que deseja usar.
Under <g1>Rendering Settings<\/g1>, in the <g2>Preferred Graphics Platform<\/g2> drop-down menu, select the graphics platform you want to use.
Stride overrides the graphics platform for the platforms you selected.
Stride substitui a plataforma gráfica para as plataformas selecionadas.
Stride overrides the graphics platform for the platforms you selected.
Check which graphics platform your project uses
Verifique qual plataforma gráfica seu projeto usa
Check which graphics platform your project uses
Add a break point to your game code (eg in a script).
Adicione um ponto de interrupção ao seu código de jogo (por exemplo, em um script).
Add a break point to your game code (eg in a script).
Check the value of the <g1>GraphicsDevice.Platform<\/g1> variable.
Check the value of the <g1>GraphicsDevice.Platform<\/g1> variable.
